description:
Utility class for hashing strings including a password encoder.

        Written originally for ExpenseTracker project
        in 2024, then modified for further use.

        This library provides a simple way to hash data using various algorithms
        such as SHA-256, SHA-512, and MD5. It also includes a password encoder
        that can hash passwords with a salt for added security.
        The library is designed to be easy to use and integrate into Java applications.
